title: Not For Use In Navigation: Thirteen Stories
description: The bell, the lantern, the witching hour…  A refugee arrives from elsewhere in time; a generation ship makes landfall; a vast galactic empire settles to the business of government. Tarot readers find hope in the cards; witches live through the aftermath of war; and Indian mothers think it’s high time you were married. Here are thirteen stories of love and queerness, hope and decolonisation, and the inevitability of change.  Includes a new introduction by the author and four previously unpublished folktales.  “[Iona Datt Sharma] is adept at creating entire worlds in a compact, delicately finished package, blending pure sensibility with the best bits of the magical realist movement.” -Jeannelle M. Ferreira, author of The Covert Captain
author: Iona Datt Sharma
